# WidgetFamily.systemLarge

**Case**

A large widget.

## Declaration

```swift
case systemLarge
```

## Discussion

The large system widget can appear on the Home Screen or in the Today View in iOS and iPadOS. In macOS, the large system widget can appear on the desktop or in Notification Center.

## Accessing system families

- **WidgetFamily.systemSmall**: A small widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemMedium**: A medium-sized widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemExtraLarge**: An extra-large widget.
- **WidgetFamily.systemExtraLargePortrait**: An extra-large widget that uses a portrait orientation.
